title: [威士忌]SMWS-41.79 (Dailuaine)
content:
https://i.imgur.com/6hsg0O1.jpg

Dailuaine from Speyside is a mysterious distillery. There was no official bottle from Dailuaine distillery, almost whiskies form them were made for blended whiskies and private bottling. What a chance I have an opportunity to have a taste of this SMWS (Scotch Malt Whisky Society).
As for the SMWS, it’s actually a club instead of an independent bottling company. Whisky lovers all around the world united and raised this club, and select finest casks among all distilleries from the world. Bottling in dark green glasses avoiding for any possibilities of color prejudiced. Every single distilleries was given a code for masking any brand effect, in order to reach the true spirit of ‘’whisky tasting.’’
.
Though there was a code list of every distilleries all over the world…
.
SMWS, cask no. 41.79 (Dailuaine Distillery from Speyside)
Aged 11 years, straight from cask, no artificial coloring, non chill-filtered
Matured in 1st-fill barrel and ex-Bourbon casks
.
Color: crystal gold
Nosing: intense sweetness, sawdust, wood craft factory, leather, sunny mellows and herbs
Palating: strong impression of fruity sponge cake, Granny lemon tart, smashed apple crust and a hint of sweetened oolong tea
Aftertaste: extra long, tannin, baked tea, orange peals, slightly mints flash at the end
.
為什麼
一定要
十五個
中文字
啦啦啦
